word_mean: 腺病：腺体肿大，尤指淋巴结肿大

sentence.Network_en: Local infection or trauma causing the adenopathy should be searched for carefully.
sentence.Network_cn: 局限性感染或外伤引起的淋巴结肿大应仔细检查.

sentence.Network_en: Oropharyngeal and dental infections can also cause cervical adenopathy.
sentence.Network_cn: 口咽炎及牙部感染同样导致颈部腺病.

sentence.Network_en: Supraclavicular adenopathy is almost always abnormal.
sentence.Network_cn: 锁骨上腺病通常不正常.

femoral adenopathy is usually located in the femoral triangle in the area of the node of Cloquet .股淋巴结病常位于股三角的Cloquet淋巴结区。
Local infection or trauma causing the adenopathy should be searched for carefully ., 局限性感染或外伤引起的淋巴结肿大应仔细检查.

list.abs: There is no abdominal ascites , adenopathy or abdominal mass., 有没有腹部腹水 , 淋巴结或腹部肿块.
femoral adenopathy is usually located in the femoral triangle in the area of the node of Cloquet .股淋巴结病常位于股三角的Cloquet淋巴结区。
although femoral adenopathy can also be secondary to chronic infection and trauma , it is much more commonly of pathologic significance is inguinal adenopathy .尽管股淋巴结病可继发于慢性感染或外伤，它比腹股沟淋巴结病更具病理学意义。
whenever there is evidence of generalized adenopathy , these groups should be uated carefully .任何存在广泛性淋巴结病的证据情况下，这些淋巴结组应被仔细评估。
